◆ absorb_meat()

bool mattack::absorb_meat ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 4286 of file monattack.cpp.

4287{
4288 //Absorb no more than 1/10th monster's volume, times the volume of a meat chunk
4289 const int monster_volume = units::to_liter( z->get_volume() );
4290 const float average_meat_chunk_volume = 0.5;
4291 // TODO: dynamically get volume of meat
4292 const int max_meat_absorbed = monster_volume / 10.0 * average_meat_chunk_volume;
4293 //For every milliliter of meat absorbed, heal this many HP
4294 const float meat_absorption_factor = 0.01;
4295 //Search surrounding tiles for meat
4296 for( const auto &p : g->m.points_in_radius( z->pos(), 1 ) ) {
4297 auto items = g->m.i_at( p );
4298 for( auto &current_item : items ) {
4299 const material_id current_item_material = current_item.get_base_material().ident();
4300 if( current_item_material == material_id( "flesh" ) ||
4301 current_item_material == material_id( "hflesh" ) ) {
4302 //We have something meaty! Calculate how much it will heal the monster
4303 const int ml_of_meat = units::to_milliliter<int>( current_item.volume() );
4304 const int total_charges = current_item.count();
4305 const int ml_per_charge = ml_of_meat / total_charges;
4306 //We have a max size of meat here to avoid absorbing whole corpses.
4307 if( ml_per_charge > max_meat_absorbed * 1000 ) {
4308 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %1$s quivers hungrily in the direction of the %2$s." ), z->name(),
4309 current_item.tname() );
4310 return false;
4311 }
4312 if( current_item.count_by_charges() ) {
4313 //Choose a random amount of meat charges to absorb
4314 int meat_absorbed = std::min( max_meat_absorbed, rng( 1, total_charges ) );
4315 const int hp_to_heal = meat_absorbed * ml_per_charge * meat_absorption_factor;
4316 z->heal( hp_to_heal, true );
4317 g->m.use_charges( p, 0, current_item.type->get_id(), meat_absorbed );
4318 } else {
4319 //Only absorb one meaty item
4320 int meat_absorbed = 1;
4321 const int hp_to_heal = meat_absorbed * ml_per_charge * meat_absorption_factor;
4322 z->heal( hp_to_heal, true );
4323 g->m.use_amount( p, 0, current_item.type->get_id(), meat_absorbed );
4324 }
4325 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
4326 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %1$s absorbs the %2$s, growing larger." ), z->name(),
4327 current_item.tname() );
4328 add_msg( m_debug, "The %1$s now has %2$s out of %3$s hp", z->name(), z->get_hp(),
4329 z->get_hp_max() );
4330 }
4331 return true;
4332 }
4333 }
4334 }
4335 return false;
4336}

◆ acid()

bool mattack::acid ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 587 of file monattack.cpp.

588{
589 if( !z->can_act() ) {
590 return false;
591 }
592
593 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
594 if( target == nullptr ) {
595 return false;
596 }
597
598 // Can't see/reach target, no attack
599 if( !z->sees( *target ) ||
600 !g->m.clear_path( z->pos(), target->pos(), 10, 1, 100 ) ) {
601 return false;
602 }
603 // It takes a while
604 z->moves -= 300;
605 sounds::sound( z->pos(), 4, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "a spitting noise." ), false, "misc",
606 "spitting" );
607
608 projectile proj;
609 proj.speed = 10;
610 // Mostly just for momentum
611 proj.impact.add_damage( DT_ACID, 5 );
612 proj.range = 10;
613 proj.add_effect( ammo_effect_NO_OVERSHOOT );
614 auto dealt = projectile_attack( proj, z->pos(), target->pos(), dispersion_sources{ 5400 }, z );
615 const tripoint &hitp = dealt.end_point;
616 const Creature *hit_critter = dealt.hit_critter;
617 if( hit_critter == nullptr && g->m.hit_with_acid( hitp ) && g->u.sees( hitp ) ) {
618 add_msg( _( "A glob of acid hits the %s!" ),
619 g->m.tername( hitp ) );
620 if( g->m.impassable( hitp ) ) {
621 // TODO: Allow it to spill on the side it hit from
622 return true;
623 }
624 }
625
626 for( int i = -3; i <= 3; i++ ) {
627 for( int j = -3; j <= 3; j++ ) {
628 tripoint dest = hitp + tripoint( i, j, 0 );
629 if( g->m.passable( dest ) &&
630 g->m.clear_path( dest, hitp, 6, 1, 100 ) &&
631 ( ( one_in( std::abs( j ) ) && one_in( std::abs( i ) ) ) || ( i == 0 && j == 0 ) ) ) {
632 g->m.add_field( dest, fd_acid, 2 );
633 }
634 }
635 }
636
637 return true;
638}

◆ acid_accurate()

bool mattack::acid_accurate ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 703 of file monattack.cpp.

704{
705 if( !z->can_act() ) {
706 return false;
707 }
708
709 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
710 if( target == nullptr ) {
711 return false;
712 }
713
714 const int range = rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() );
715 if( range > 10 || range < 2 || !z->sees( *target ) ) {
716 return false;
717 }
718
719 z->moves -= 50;
720
721 projectile proj;
722 proj.speed = 10;
723 proj.range = 10;
724 proj.add_effect( ammo_effect_BLINDS_EYES );
725 proj.add_effect( ammo_effect_NO_DAMAGE_SCALING );
726 proj.impact.add_damage( DT_ACID, rng( 3, 5 ) );
727 // Make it arbitrarily less accurate at close ranges
728 projectile_attack( proj, z->pos(), target->pos(), dispersion_sources{ 8000.0 * range }, z );
729
730 return true;
731}

◆ acid_barf()

bool mattack::acid_barf ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 640 of file monattack.cpp.

641{
642 if( !z->can_act() ) {
643 return false;
644 }
645
646 // Let it be used on non-player creatures
647 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
648 if( target == nullptr || !is_adjacent( z, target, false ) ) {
649 return false;
650 }
651
652 z->moves -= 80;
653 // Make sure it happens before uncanny dodge
654 g->m.add_field( target->pos(), fd_acid, 1 );
655 bool uncanny = target->uncanny_dodge();
656 // Can we dodge the attack? Uses player dodge function % chance (melee.cpp)
657 if( uncanny || dodge_check( z, target ) ) {
658 auto msg_type = target == &g->u ? m_warning : m_info;
659 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( msg_type,
660 _( "The %s barfs acid at you, but you dodge!" ),
661 _( "The %s barfs acid at <npcname>, but they dodge!" ),
662 z->name() );
663 if( !uncanny ) {
664 target->on_dodge( z, z->type->melee_skill * 2 );
665 }
666
667 return true;
668 }
669
670 body_part hit = target->get_random_body_part()->token;
671 int dam = rng( 5, 12 );
672 dam = target->deal_damage( z, convert_bp( hit ).id(), damage_instance( DT_ACID,
673 dam ) ).total_damage();
674 target->add_env_effect( effect_corroding, hit, 5, time_duration::from_turns( dam / 2 + 5 ), hit );
675
676 if( dam > 0 ) {
677 auto msg_type = target == &g->u ? m_bad : m_info;
678 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( msg_type,
679 //~ 1$s is monster name, 2$s bodypart in accusative
680 _( "The %1$s barfs acid on your %2$s for %3$d damage!" ),
681 //~ 1$s is monster name, 2$s bodypart in accusative
682 _( "The %1$s barfs acid on <npcname>'s %2$s for %3$d damage!" ),
683 z->name(),
684 body_part_name_accusative( hit ),
685 dam );
686
687 if( hit == bp_eyes ) {
688 target->add_env_effect( effect_blind, bp_eyes, 3, 1_minutes );
689 }
690 } else {
691 target->add_msg_player_or_npc(
692 _( "The %1$s barfs acid on your %2$s, but it washes off the armor!" ),
693 _( "The %1$s barfs acid on <npcname>'s %2$s, but it washes off the armor!" ),
694 z->name(),
695 body_part_name_accusative( hit ) );
696 }
697
698 target->on_hit( z, convert_bp( hit ).id() );
699
700 return true;
701}

◆ antqueen()

bool mattack::antqueen ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 375 of file monattack.cpp.

376{
377 std::vector<tripoint> egg_points;
378 std::vector<monster *> ants;
379 // Count up all adjacent tiles the contain at least one egg.
380 for( const auto &dest : g->m.points_in_radius( z->pos(), 2 ) ) {
381 if( g->m.impassable( dest ) ) {
382 continue;
383 }
384
385 if( monster *const mon = g->critter_at<monster>( dest ) ) {
386 if( mon->type->default_faction == mfaction_id( "ant" ) && mon->type->upgrades ) {
387 ants.push_back( mon );
388 }
389
390 continue;
391 }
392
393 if( g->is_empty( dest ) && g->m.has_items( dest ) ) {
394 for( auto &i : g->m.i_at( dest ) ) {
395 if( i.typeId() == itype_ant_egg ) {
396 egg_points.push_back( dest );
397 // Done looking at this tile
398 break;
399 }
400 }
401 }
402 }
403
404 if( !ants.empty() ) {
405 // It takes a while
406 z->moves -= 100;
407 monster *ant = random_entry( ants );
408 if( g->u.sees( *z ) && g->u.sees( *ant ) ) {
409 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %1$s feeds an %2$s and it grows!" ), z->name(),
410 ant->name() );
411 }
412 ant->poly( ant->type->upgrade_into );
413 } else if( egg_points.empty() ) {
414 // There's no eggs nearby--lay one.
415 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
416 add_msg( _( "The %s lays an egg!" ), z->name() );
417 }
418 g->m.spawn_item( z->pos(), "ant_egg", 1, 0, calendar::turn );
419 } else {
420 // There are eggs nearby. Let's hatch some.
421 // It takes a while
422 z->moves -= 20 * egg_points.size();
423 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
424 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %s tends nearby eggs, and they hatch!" ), z->name() );
425 }
426 for( const tripoint &egg_pos : egg_points ) {
427 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( egg_pos );
428 for( map_stack::iterator it = items.begin(); it != items.end(); ) {
429 if( it->typeId() != itype_ant_egg ) {
430 ++it;
431 continue;
432 }
433 const mtype_id &mt = z->type->id == mon_ant_acid_queen ? mon_ant_acid_larva : mon_ant_larva;
434 // Max one hatch per tile
435 if( monster *const mon = g->place_critter_at( mt, egg_pos ) ) {
436 mon->make_ally( *z );
437 it = items.erase( it );
438 break;
439 }
440 }
441 }
442 }
443
444 return true;
445}
cata::colony::colony_iterator< false >
int_id< monfaction >
item_stack::begin
iterator begin()
Definition: item_stack.cpp:28
item_stack::end
iterator end()
Definition: item_stack.cpp:33

5153{
5154 int choice;
5155 int redo;
5156
5157 if( !z->can_act() ) {
5158 return false;
5159 }
5160
5161 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
5162 if( target == nullptr ||
5163 !is_adjacent( z, target, false ) ||
5164 !z->sees( *target ) ) {
5165 return false;
5166 }
5167
5168 player *foe = dynamic_cast< player * >( target );
5169
5170 do {
5171 choice = rng( 1, 3 );
5172 redo = false;
5173
5174 // ignore disarm if the target isn't a "player" or isn't armed
5175 if( choice == 3 && foe != nullptr && !foe->is_armed() ) {
5176 redo = true;
5177 }
5178
5179 } while( redo );
5180
5181 switch( choice ) {
5182 case 1:
5183 bio_op_takedown( z );
5184 break;
5185 case 2:
5186 bio_op_impale( z );
5187 break;
5188 case 3:
5189 bio_op_disarm( z );
5190 break;
5191 }
5192
5193 return true;
5194}

◆ boomer()

bool mattack::boomer ( monster *  z)
Dodge increases chance to avoid boomer effect

Definition at line 847 of file monattack.cpp.

848{
849 if( !z->can_act() ) {
850 return false;
851 }
852
853 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
854 if( target == nullptr || rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() ) > 3 || !z->sees( *target ) ) {
855 return false;
856 }
857
858 map &here = get_map();
859
860 std::vector<tripoint> line = here.find_clear_path( z->pos(), target->pos() );
861 // It takes a while
862 z->moves -= 250;
863 bool u_see = g->u.sees( *z );
864 if( u_see ) {
865 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %s spews bile!" ), z->name() );
866 }
867 tripoint prev_point = z->pos();
868 bool obstructed = false;
869 for( auto &i : line ) {
870 if( here.obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( prev_point, i ) ) {
871 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
872 i.x = prev_point.x;
873 } else {
874 i.y = prev_point.y;
875 }
876 obstructed = true;
877 }
878
879 here.add_field( i, fd_bile, 1 );
880
881 // If bile hit a solid tile, return.
882 if( obstructed || here.impassable( i ) ) {
883 here.add_field( i, fd_bile, 3 );
884 if( g->u.sees( i ) ) {
885 add_msg( _( "Bile splatters on the %s!" ),
886 here.tername( i ) );
887 }
888 return true;
889 }
890 prev_point = i;
891 }
892 if( !target->uncanny_dodge() ) {
893 ///\EFFECT_DODGE increases chance to avoid boomer effect
894 if( rng( 0, 10 ) > target->get_dodge() || one_in( target->get_dodge() ) ) {
895 target->add_env_effect( effect_boomered, bp_eyes, 3, 12_turns );
896 } else if( u_see ) {
897 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You dodge it!" ),
898 _( "<npcname> dodges it!" ) );
899 }
900 target->on_dodge( z, 5 );
901 }
902
903 return true;
904}

936 }
937 here.add_field( i, fd_bile, 1 );
938 if( obstructed || here.impassable( i ) ) {
939 here.add_field( i, fd_bile, 3 );
940 if( g->u.sees( i ) ) {
941 add_msg( _( "Bile splatters on the %s!" ), here.tername( i ) );
942 }
943 return true;
944 }
945 prev_point = i;
946 }
947 if( !target->uncanny_dodge() ) {
948 ///\EFFECT_DODGE increases chance to avoid glowing boomer effect
949 if( rng( 0, 10 ) > target->get_dodge() || one_in( target->get_dodge() ) ) {
950 target->add_env_effect( effect_boomered, bp_eyes, 5, 25_turns );
951 target->on_dodge( z, 5 );
952 for( int i = 0; i < rng( 2, 4 ); i++ ) {
953 body_part bp = random_body_part();
954 target->add_env_effect( effect_glowing, bp, 4, 4_minutes );
955 if( target->has_effect( effect_glowing ) ) {
956 break;
957 }
958 }
959 } else {
960 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You dodge it!" ),
961 _( "<npcname> dodges it!" ) );
962 }
963 }
964
965 return true;
966}

◆ callblobs()

bool mattack::callblobs ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 2392 of file monattack.cpp.

2393{
2394 if( z->friendly ) {
2395 // TODO: handle friendly monsters
2396 return false;
2397 }
2398 // The huge brain blob interposes other blobs between it and any threat.
2399 // For the moment just target the player, this gets a bit more complicated
2400 // if we want to deal with NPCS and friendly monsters as well.
2401 // The strategy is to send about 1/3 of the available blobs after the player,
2402 // and keep the rest near the brain blob for protection.
2403 tripoint enemy = g->u.pos();
2404 std::list<monster *> allies;
2405 std::vector<tripoint> nearby_points = closest_points_first( z->pos(), 3 );
2406 for( monster &candidate : g->all_monsters() ) {
2407 if( candidate.type->in_species( species_BLOB ) && candidate.type->id != mon_blob_brain ) {
2408 // Just give the allies consistent assignments.
2409 // Don't worry about trying to make the orders optimal.
2410 allies.push_back( &candidate );
2411 }
2412 }
2413 // 1/3 of the available blobs, unless they would fill the entire area near the brain.
2414 const int num_guards = std::min( allies.size() / 3, nearby_points.size() );
2415 int guards = 0;
2416 for( std::list<monster *>::iterator ally = allies.begin();
2417 ally != allies.end(); ++ally, ++guards ) {
2418 tripoint post = enemy;
2419 if( guards < num_guards ) {
2420 // Each guard is assigned a spot in the nearby_points vector based on their order.
2421 int assigned_spot = ( nearby_points.size() * guards ) / num_guards;
2422 post = nearby_points[ assigned_spot ];
2423 }
2424 ( *ally )->set_dest( post );
2425 if( !( *ally )->has_effect( effect_ai_controlled ) ) {
2426 ( *ally )->add_effect( effect_ai_controlled, 1_turns, num_bp );
2427 }
2428 }
2429 // This is telepathy, doesn't take any moves.
2430
2431 return true;
2432}

◆ chickenbot()

bool mattack::chickenbot ( monster *  z)

3830{
3831 int mode = 0;
3832 int boo_hoo = 0;
3833 Creature *target;
3834 if( z->friendly == 0 ) {
3835 target = z->attack_target();
3836 if( target == nullptr ) {
3837 return false;
3838 }
3839 } else {
3840 target = z->auto_find_hostile_target( 38, boo_hoo );
3841 if( target == nullptr ) {
3842 if( boo_hoo > 0 && g->u.sees( *z ) ) { // because that stupid oaf was in the way!
3843 add_msg( m_warning, vgettext( "Pointed in your direction, the %s emits an IFF warning beep.",
3844 "Pointed in your direction, the %s emits %d annoyed sounding beeps.",
3845 boo_hoo ),
3846 z->name(), boo_hoo );
3847 }
3848 return false;
3849 }
3850 }
3851
3852 int cap = target->power_rating() - 1;
3853 monster *mon = dynamic_cast< monster * >( target );
3854 // Their attitude to us and not ours to them, so that bobcats won't get gunned down
3855 // Only monster-types for now - assuming humans are smart enough not to make it obvious
3856 // Unless damaged - then everything is hostile
3857 if( z->get_hp() <= z->get_hp_max() ||
3858 ( mon != nullptr && mon->attitude_to( *z ) == Creature::Attitude::A_HOSTILE ) ) {
3859 cap += 2;
3860 }
3861
3862 int dist = rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() );
3863 int player_dist = rl_dist( target->pos(), g->u.pos() );
3864 if( dist == 1 && one_in( 2 ) ) {
3865 // Use tazer at point-blank range, and even then, not continuously.
3866 mode = 1;
3867 } else if( ( z->friendly == 0 || player_dist >= 6 ) &&
3868 // Avoid shooting near player if we're friendly.
3869 ( dist >= 12 || ( g->u.in_vehicle && dist >= 6 ) ) ) {
3870 // Only use at long range, unless player is in a vehicle, then tolerate closer targeting.
3871 mode = 3;
3872 } else if( dist >= 4 ) {
3873 // Don't use machine gun at very close range, under the assumption that targets at that range can dodge?
3874 mode = 2;
3875 }
3876
3877 // No attacks were valid!
3878 if( mode == 0 ) {
3879 return false;
3880 }
3881
3882 if( mode > cap ) {
3883 mode = cap;
3884 }
3885 switch( mode ) {
3886 case 0:
3887 case 1:
3888 // If we downgraded to taze, but are out of range, don't act.
3889 if( dist <= 1 ) {
3890 taze( z, target );
3891 }
3892 break;
3893 case 2:
3894 if( dist <= 20 ) {
3895 rifle( z, target );
3896 }
3897 break;
3898 case 3:
3899 if( dist <= 38 ) {
3900 frag( z, target );
3901 }
3902 break;
3903 default:
3904 // Weak stuff, shouldn't bother with
3905 return false;
3906 }
3907
3908 return true;
3909}

3822 } else {

◆ dermatik()

bool mattack::dermatik ( monster *  z)
Melee increases chance to deflect dermatik attack Unarmed increases chance to deflect dermatik attack Dexterity increases chance of deflecting dermatik attack with TAIL_CATTLE Unarmed increases chance of deflecting dermatik attack with TAIL_CATTLE

Definition at line 2138 of file monattack.cpp.

2139{
2140 if( !z->can_act() ) {
2141 return false;
2142 }
2143
2144 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
2145 if( target == nullptr ||
2146 !is_adjacent( z, target, true ) ||
2147 !z->sees( *target ) ) {
2148 return false;
2149 }
2150
2151 if( target->uncanny_dodge() ) {
2152 return true;
2153 }
2154 player *foe = dynamic_cast< player * >( target );
2155 if( foe == nullptr ) {
2156 return true; // No implanting monsters for now
2157 }
2158 // Can we dodge the attack? Uses player dodge function % chance (melee.cpp)
2159 if( dodge_check( z, target ) ) {
2160 if( target == &g->u ) {
2161 add_msg( _( "The %s tries to land on you, but you dodge." ), z->name() );
2162 }
2163 z->stumble();
2164 target->on_dodge( z, z->type->melee_skill * 2 );
2165 return true;
2166 }
2167
2168 // Can we swat the bug away?
2169 int dodge_roll = z->dodge_roll();
2170 ///\EFFECT_MELEE increases chance to deflect dermatik attack
2171
2172 ///\EFFECT_UNARMED increases chance to deflect dermatik attack
2173 int swat_skill = ( foe->get_skill_level( skill_melee ) + foe->get_skill_level(
2174 skill_unarmed ) * 2 ) / 3;
2175 int player_swat = dice( swat_skill, 10 );
2176 if( foe->has_trait( trait_TAIL_CATTLE ) ) {
2177 target->add_msg_if_player( _( "You swat at the %s with your tail!" ), z->name() );
2178 ///\EFFECT_DEX increases chance of deflecting dermatik attack with TAIL_CATTLE
2179
2180 ///\EFFECT_UNARMED increases chance of deflecting dermatik attack with TAIL_CATTLE
2181 player_swat += ( ( foe->dex_cur + foe->get_skill_level( skill_unarmed ) ) / 2 );
2182 }
2183 if( player_swat > dodge_roll ) {
2184 target->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s lands on you, but you swat it off." ), z->name() );
2185 if( z->get_hp() >= z->get_hp_max() / 2 ) {
2186 z->apply_damage( &g->u, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 1 );
2187 z->check_dead_state();
2188 }
2189 if( player_swat > dodge_roll * 1.5 ) {
2190 z->stumble();
2191 }
2192 return true;
2193 }
2194
2195 // Can the bug penetrate our armor?
2196 const bodypart_id targeted = target->get_random_body_part();
2197 if( 4 < g->u.get_armor_cut( targeted ) / 3 ) {
2198 //~ 1$s monster name(dermatik), 2$s bodypart name in accusative.
2199 target->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %1$s lands on your %2$s, but can't penetrate your armor." ),
2200 z->name(), body_part_name_accusative( targeted->token ) );
2201 z->moves -= 150; // Attempted laying takes a while
2202 return true;
2203 }
2204
2205 // Success!
2206 z->moves -= 500; // Successful laying takes a long time
2207 //~ 1$s monster name(dermatik), 2$s bodypart name in accusative.
2208 target->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The %1$s sinks its ovipositor into your %2$s!" ),
2209 z->name(),
2210 body_part_name_accusative( targeted->token ) );
2211 if( !foe->has_trait( trait_PARAIMMUNE ) || !foe->has_trait( trait_ACIDBLOOD ) ) {
2212 foe->add_effect( effect_dermatik, 1_turns, targeted->token );
2213 g->events().send<event_type::dermatik_eggs_injected>( foe->getID() );
2214 }
2215
2216 return true;
2217}

344{
345 for( const auto &p : g->m.points_in_radius( z->pos(), 1 ) ) {
346 //Protect crop seeds from carnivores, give omnivores eat_crop special also
347 if( g->m.has_flag( "PLANT", p ) ) {
348 continue;
349 }
350 // Don't snap up food RIGHT under the player's nose.
351 if( z->friendly && rl_dist( g->u.pos(), p ) <= 2 ) {
352 continue;
353 }
354 auto items = g->m.i_at( p );
355 for( auto &item : items ) {
356 //Fun limit prevents scavengers from eating feces
357 if( !item.is_food() || item.get_comestible_fun() < -20 ) {
358 continue;
359 }
360 //Don't eat own eggs
361 if( z->type->baby_egg != item.type->get_id() ) {
362 int consumed = 1;
363 if( item.count_by_charges() ) {
364 g->m.use_charges( p, 0, item.type->get_id(), consumed );
365 } else {
366 g->m.use_amount( p, 0, item.type->get_id(), consumed );
367 }
368 return true;
369 }
370 }
371 }
372 return true;
373}

3705 // friendly
3706 // It takes a while
3707 z->moves -= 500;

3709 // shouldn't happen
3710 debugmsg( "mattack::flame invoked on invisible target" );

3715 if( here.obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( prev_point, i ) ) {

3717 i.x = prev_point.x;
3718 } else {
3719 i.y = prev_point.y;
3720 }
3721 }
3722

3728 here.tername( i.xy() ) );
3729 }
3730 return;
3731 }

3752 intervening.x = prev_point.x;
3753 } else {
3754 intervening.y = prev_point.y;
3755 }

3759 here.tername( intervening.xy() ) );
3760 }
3761 return;
3762 }
3763 }

3767 add_msg( _( "The tongue of flame hits the %s!" ),
3768 here.tername( i.xy() ) );

3773 prev_point = i;

4252 }
4253 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
4254 add_msg( _( "The %1$s swings a massive claw at %2$s!" ), z->name(),
4255 target->disp_name() );
4256 }
4257 z->moves -= 100;
4258
4259 if( target->uncanny_dodge() ) {
4260 return true;
4261 }
4262
4263 // Can we dodge the attack? Uses player dodge function % chance (melee.cpp)
4264 if( dodge_check( z, target ) ) {
4265 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You dodge it!" ),
4266 _( "<npcname> dodges it!" ) );
4267 target->on_dodge( z, z->type->melee_skill * 2 );
4268 return true;
4269 }
4270 const bodypart_id hit = target->get_random_body_part();
4271 // TODO: 10 bashing damage doesn't sound like a "massive claw" but a mediocre punch
4272 int dam = rng( 5, 10 );
4273 target->deal_damage( z, hit, damage_instance( DT_BASH, dam ) );
4274 if( one_in( 6 ) ) {
4275 target->add_effect( effect_downed, 3_minutes );
4276 }
4277
4278 //~ 1$s is bodypart name, 2$d is damage value.
4279 target->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s is battered for %2$d damage!" ),
4280 body_part_name( hit->token ), dam );
4281 target->on_hit( z, hit );
4282
4283 return true;
4284}

2312{
2313 if( z->friendly ) {
2314 // TODO: handle friendly monsters
2315 return false;
2316 }
2317
2318 bool didit = false;
2319 std::vector<tripoint> pts = closest_points_first( z->pos(), 1 );
2320 // Don't check own tile
2321 pts.erase( pts.begin() );
2322 for( const tripoint &dest : pts ) {
2323 Creature *critter = g->critter_at( dest );
2324 if( critter == nullptr ) {
2325 if( z->get_speed_base() > 85 && rng( 0, 250 ) < z->get_speed_base() ) {
2326 // If we're big enough, spawn a baby blob.
2327 didit = true;
2328 z->set_speed_base( z->get_speed_base() - 15 );
2329 if( monster *const blob = g->place_critter_at( mon_blob_small, dest ) ) {
2330 blob->make_ally( *z );
2331 }
2332
2333 break;
2334 }
2335
2336 continue;
2337 }
2338
2339 if( critter->is_player() || critter->is_npc() ) {
2340 // If we hit the player or some NPC, cover them with slime
2341 didit = true;
2342 // TODO: Add some sort of a resistance/dodge roll
2343 critter->add_effect( effect_slimed, rng( 0_turns, 1_turns * z->get_hp() ) );
2344 break;
2345 }
2346
2347 monster &othermon = *( dynamic_cast<monster *>( critter ) );
2348 // Hit a monster. If it's a blob, give it our speed. Otherwise, blobify it?
2349 if( z->get_speed_base() > 40 && othermon.type->in_species( species_BLOB ) ) {
2350 if( othermon.type->id == mon_blob_brain ) {
2351 // Brain blobs don't get sped up, they heal at the cost of the other blob.
2352 // But only if they are hurt badly.
2353 if( othermon.get_hp() < othermon.get_hp_max() / 2 ) {
2354 othermon.heal( z->get_speed_base(), true );
2355 z->set_hp( 0 );
2356 return true;
2357 }
2358 continue;
2359 }
2360 didit = true;
2361 othermon.set_speed_base( othermon.get_speed_base() + 5 );
2362 z->set_speed_base( z->get_speed_base() - 5 );
2363 if( othermon.type->id == mon_blob_small && othermon.get_speed_base() >= 60 ) {
2364 poly_keep_speed( othermon, mon_blob );
2365 } else if( othermon.type->id == mon_blob && othermon.get_speed_base() >= 80 ) {
2366 poly_keep_speed( othermon, mon_blob_large );
2367 }
2368 } else if( ( othermon.made_of( material_id( "flesh" ) ) ||
2369 othermon.made_of( material_id( "veggy" ) ) ||
2370 othermon.made_of( material_id( "iflesh" ) ) ) &&
2371 rng( 0, z->get_hp() ) > rng( othermon.get_hp() / 2, othermon.get_hp() ) ) {
2372 didit = blobify( *z, othermon );
2373 }
2374 }
2375
2376 if( didit ) { // We did SOMEthing.
2377 if( z->type->id == mon_blob && z->get_speed_base() <= 50 ) {
2378 // We shrank!
2379 poly_keep_speed( *z, mon_blob_small );
2380 } else if( z->type->id == mon_blob_large && z->get_speed_base() <= 70 ) {
2381 // We shrank!
2382 poly_keep_speed( *z, mon_blob );
2383 }
2384
2385 z->moves = 0;
2386 return true;
2387 }
2388
2389 return true; // consider returning false to try again immediately if nothing happened?
2390}

bool mattack::fungus ( monster *  z)

1696{

1698 // It takes a while
1699 z->moves -= 200;
1700

1702 sounds::sound( z->pos(), 10, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Pouf!" ), false, "misc", "puff" );
1703 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
1704 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Spores are released from the %s!" ), z->name() );
1705 }
1706
1707 bool on_fungus = g->m.has_flag_ter( "FUNGUS", z->pos() );
1708 int radius = one_in( 4 ) ? 2 : 1;
1709 double spore_chance = ( on_fungus ? 0.5f : 0.2f ) / ( ( radius + 1 ) * ( radius + 1 ) );
1710 fungal_effects fe( *g, g->m );
1711 for( const tripoint &sporep : g->m.points_in_radius( z->pos(), radius ) ) {
1712 if( sporep == z->pos() ) {
1713 continue;
1714 }
1715 const int dist = rl_dist( z->pos(), sporep );
1716 if( !one_in( dist ) ||
1717 g->m.impassable( sporep ) ||
1718 ( dist > 1 && !g->m.clear_path( z->pos(), sporep, 2, 1, 10 ) ) ) {
1719 continue;
1720 }
1721
1722 fe.fungalize( sporep, z, spore_chance );
1723 }
1724
1725 return true;
1726}

◆ grab()

bool mattack::grab ( monster *  z)
Dexterity increases chance to avoid being grabbed

2692{
2693 if( !z->can_act() ) {
2694 return false;
2695 }
2696 // Grabbing non-Characters not supported yet
2697 player *target = dynamic_cast<player *>( z->attack_target() );
2698 player *pl = target;
2699 if( target == nullptr || !is_adjacent( z, target, false ) ) {
2700 return false;
2701 }
2702
2703 const bool uncanny = target->uncanny_dodge();
2704 const auto msg_type = target == &g->u ? m_warning : m_info;
2705 if( uncanny || dodge_check( z, target ) ) {
2706 z->moves -= 40;
2707 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( msg_type, _( "The %s gropes at you, but you dodge!" ),
2708 _( "The %s gropes at <npcname>, but they dodge!" ),
2709 z->name() );
2710
2711 if( !uncanny ) {
2712 target->on_dodge( z, z->type->melee_skill * 2 );
2713 }
2714
2715 return true;
2716 }
2717
2718 item &cur_weapon = pl->weapon;
2719 ///\EFFECT_DEX increases chance to avoid being grabbed
2720 if( pl->can_use_grab_break_tec( cur_weapon ) &&
2721 rng( 0, pl->get_dex() ) > rng( 0, z->type->melee_sides + z->type->melee_dice ) ) {
2722 if( target->has_effect( effect_grabbed ) ) {
2723 target->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s tries to grab you as well, but you bat it away!" ),
2724 z->name() );
2725 } else if( pl->is_throw_immune() && ( !pl->is_armed() ||
2726 pl->martial_arts_data->selected_has_weapon( pl->weapon.typeId() ) ) ) {
2727 target->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s tries to grab you" ), z->name() );
2728 thrown_by_judo( z );
2729 } else if( pl->has_grab_break_tec() ) {
2730 ma_technique tech = pl->martial_arts_data->get_grab_break_tec( cur_weapon );
2731 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info, _( tech.avatar_message ), _( tech.npc_message ), z->name() );
2732 } else {
2733 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info, _( "The %s tries to grab you, but you break its grab!" ),
2734 _( "The %s tries to grab <npcname>, but they break its grab!" ),
2735 z->name() );
2736 }
2737 return true;
2738 }
2739
2740 const int prev_effect = target->get_effect_int( effect_grabbed );
2741 z->add_effect( effect_grabbing, 2_turns );
2742 target->add_effect( effect_grabbed, 2_turns, bp_torso,
2743 prev_effect + z->get_grab_strength() );
2744 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "The %s grabs you!" ), _( "The %s grabs <npcname>!" ),
2745 z->name() );
2746
2747 // A hit to use up our moves
2748 z->melee_attack( *target );
2749 // Set up a bite on the next turn
2750 if( z->type->special_attacks.count( "BITE" ) != 0 ) {
2751 z->set_special( "BITE", 1 );
2752 }
2753
2754 return true;
2755}

◆ grab_drag()

bool mattack::grab_drag ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 2757 of file monattack.cpp.

2758{
2759 if( !z || !z->can_act() ) {
2760 return false;
2761 }
2762 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
2763 if( target == nullptr || rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() ) > 1 ) {
2764 return false;
2765 }
2766
2767 if( target->has_effect( effect_under_op ) ) {
2768 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
2769 _( "The %s tries to drag you, but you're securely fastened in the autodoc." ),
2770 _( "The %s tries to drag <npcname>, but they're securely fastened in the autodoc." ), z->name() );
2771 return false;
2772 }
2773
2774 // First, grab the target
2775 grab( z );
2776
2777 if( !target->has_effect( effect_grabbed ) ) { //Can't drag if isn't grabbed, otherwise try and move
2778 return false;
2779 }
2780 const tripoint target_square = z->pos() - ( target->pos() - z->pos() );
2781 if( z->can_move_to( target_square ) &&
2782 target->stability_roll() < dice( z->type->melee_sides, z->type->melee_dice ) ) {
2783 player *foe = dynamic_cast<player *>( target );
2784 monster *zz = dynamic_cast<monster *>( target );
2785 tripoint zpt = z->pos();
2786 z->move_to( target_square );
2787 if( !g->is_empty( zpt ) ) { //Cancel the grab if the space is occupied by something
2788 return false;
2789 }
2790 if( target->is_player() && ( zpt.x < HALF_MAPSIZE_X ||
2791 zpt.y < HALF_MAPSIZE_Y ||
2792 zpt.x >= HALF_MAPSIZE_X + SEEX || zpt.y >= HALF_MAPSIZE_Y + SEEY ) ) {
2793 g->update_map( zpt.x, zpt.y );
2794 }
2795 if( foe != nullptr ) {
2796 if( foe->in_vehicle ) {
2797 g->m.unboard_vehicle( foe->pos() );
2798 }
2799 foe->setpos( zpt );
2800 } else {
2801 zz->setpos( zpt );
2802 }
2803 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You are dragged behind the %s!" ),
2804 _( "<npcname> gets dragged behind the %s!" ), z->name() );
2805 } else {
2806 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good, _( "You resist the %s as it tries to drag you!" ),
2807 _( "<npcname> resist the %s as it tries to drag them!" ), z->name() );
2808 }
2809 int prev_effect = target->get_effect_int( effect_grabbed );
2810 z->add_effect( effect_grabbing, 2_turns );
2811 target->add_effect( effect_grabbed, 2_turns, bp_torso, prev_effect + 3 );
2812
2813 // cooldown was not reset prior to refactor here
2814 return true;
2815}

5697 z->disable_special( "GRENADIER" );

1444
1445 // Only affect natural, dirtlike terrain or trees.
1446 if( !( g->m.has_flag_ter( "DIGGABLE", p ) ||
1447 g->m.has_flag_ter( "TREE", p ) ||
1448 g->m.ter( p ) == t_tree_young ) ) {
1449 continue;
1450 }
1451

1453 // Destroy everything
1454 g->m.destroy( p );
1455 // And then make the ground fertile
1456 g->m.ter_set( p, t_dirtmound );
1457 continue;
1458 }
1459
1460 // 1 in 4 chance to grow a tree
1461 if( !one_in( 4 ) ) {
1462 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
1463 // If no tree, perhaps underbrush
1464 g->m.ter_set( p, t_underbrush );
1465 }
1466
1467 continue;
1468 }
1469
1470 // Grow a tree and pierce stuff with it
1471 Creature *critter = g->critter_at( p );
1472 // Don't grow under friends (and self)
1473 if( critter != nullptr &&
1474 z->attitude_to( *critter ) == Creature::A_FRIENDLY ) {
1475 continue;
1476 }
1477
1478 g->m.ter_set( p, t_tree_young );

1480 continue;
1481 }

1491 }
1492

1494 if( !one_in( 5 ) ) {
1495 return true;
1496 }

1498 const auto ter = g->m.ter( p );
1499 if( ter != t_tree_young && ter != t_underbrush ) {
1500 // Skip as soon as possible to avoid all the checks
1501 continue;
1502 }
1503
1504 Creature *critter = g->critter_at( p );
1505 if( critter != nullptr && z->attitude_to( *critter ) == Creature::A_FRIENDLY ) {
1506 // Don't buff terrain below friends (and self)
1507 continue;
1508 }
1509
1510 if( ter == t_tree_young ) {
1511 // Young tree => tree
1512 // TODO: Make this deal damage too - young tree can be walked on, tree can't
1513 g->m.ter_set( p, t_tree );
1514 } else if( ter == t_underbrush ) {
1515 // Underbrush => young tree
1516 g->m.ter_set( p, t_tree_young );
1517 if( critter != nullptr && !critter->uncanny_dodge() ) {
1518 const body_part hit = body_part_hit_by_plant();
1519 critter->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
1520 //~ %s is bodypart name in accusative.
1521 _( "The underbrush beneath your feet grows and pierces your %s!" ),
1522 //~ %s is bodypart name in accusative.
1523 _( "Underbrush grows into a tree, and it pierces <npcname>'s %s!" ),
1524 body_part_name_accusative( hit ) );
1525 critter->deal_damage( z, convert_bp( hit ).id(), damage_instance( DT_STAB, rng( 10, 30 ) ) );
1526 }
1527 }
1528 }

1530 // added during refactor, previously had no cooldown reset
1531 return true;

2083 return false;

2088 }

◆ jackson()

bool mattack::jackson ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 2434 of file monattack.cpp.

2435{
2436 // Jackson draws nearby zombies into the dance.
2437 std::list<monster *> allies;
2438 std::vector<tripoint> nearby_points = closest_points_first( z->pos(), 3 );
2439 for( monster &candidate : g->all_monsters() ) {
2440 if( candidate.type->in_species( ZOMBIE ) && candidate.type->id != mon_zombie_jackson ) {
2441 // Just give the allies consistent assignments.
2442 // Don't worry about trying to make the orders optimal.
2443 allies.push_back( &candidate );
2444 }
2445 }
2446 const int num_dancers = std::min( allies.size(), nearby_points.size() );
2447 int dancers = 0;
2448 bool converted = false;
2449 for( auto ally = allies.begin(); ally != allies.end(); ++ally, ++dancers ) {
2450 tripoint post = z->pos();
2451 if( dancers < num_dancers ) {
2452 // Each dancer is assigned a spot in the nearby_points vector based on their order.
2453 int assigned_spot = ( nearby_points.size() * dancers ) / num_dancers;
2454 post = nearby_points[ assigned_spot ];
2455 }
2456 if( ( *ally )->type->id != mon_zombie_dancer ) {
2457 ( *ally )->poly( mon_zombie_dancer );
2458 converted = true;
2459 }
2460 ( *ally )->set_dest( post );
2461 if( !( *ally )->has_effect( effect_ai_controlled ) ) {
2462 ( *ally )->add_effect( effect_ai_controlled, 1_turns, num_bp );
2463 }
2464 }
2465 // Did we convert anybody?
2466 if( converted ) {
2467 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
2468 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %s lets out a high-pitched cry!" ), z->name() );
2469 }
2470 }
2471 // This is telepathy, doesn't take any moves.
2472 return true;
2473}
mon_zombie_dancer
static const mtype_id mon_zombie_dancer("mon_zombie_dancer")
ZOMBIE
static const species_id ZOMBIE("ZOMBIE")
mon_zombie_jackson
static const mtype_id mon_zombie_jackson("mon_zombie_jackson")

◆ kamikaze()

bool mattack::kamikaze ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 5449 of file monattack.cpp.

5450{
5451 if( z->ammo.empty() ) {
5452 // We somehow lost our ammo! Toggle this special off so we stop processing
5453 add_msg( m_debug, "Missing ammo in kamikaze special for %s.", z->name() );
5454 z->disable_special( "KAMIKAZE" );
5455 return true;
5456 }
5457
5458 // Get the bomb type and it's data
5459 const itype *bomb_type = &*z->ammo.begin()->first;
5460 itype_id act_bomb_type;
5461 int charges;
5462 // Hardcoded data for charge variant items
5463 if( z->ammo.begin()->first == itype_mininuke ) {
5464 act_bomb_type = itype_mininuke_act;
5465 charges = 20;
5466 } else if( z->ammo.begin()->first == itype_c4 ) {
5467 act_bomb_type = itype_c4armed;
5468 charges = 10;
5469 } else {
5470 auto usage = bomb_type->get_use( "transform" );
5471 if( usage == nullptr ) {
5472 // Invalid item usage, Toggle this special off so we stop processing
5473 add_msg( m_debug, "Invalid bomb transform use in kamikaze special for %s.", z->name() );
5474 z->disable_special( "KAMIKAZE" );
5475 return true;
5476 }
5477 const iuse_transform *actor = dynamic_cast<const iuse_transform *>( usage->get_actor_ptr() );
5478 if( actor == nullptr ) {
5479 // Invalid bomb item, Toggle this special off so we stop processing
5480 add_msg( m_debug, "Invalid bomb type in kamikaze special for %s.", z->name() );
5481 z->disable_special( "KAMIKAZE" );
5482 return true;
5483 }
5484 act_bomb_type = actor->target;
5485 charges = actor->ammo_qty;
5486 }
5487
5488 // HACK: HORRIBLE HACK ALERT! Remove the following code completely once we have working monster inventory processing
5489 if( z->has_effect( effect_countdown ) ) {
5490 if( z->get_effect( effect_countdown ).get_duration() == 1_turns ) {
5491 z->die( nullptr );
5492 // Timer is out, detonate
5493 item i_explodes( act_bomb_type, calendar::turn, 0 );
5494 i_explodes.active = true;
5495 i_explodes.process( nullptr, z->pos(), false );
5496 return false;
5497 }
5498 return false;
5499 }
5500 // END HORRIBLE HACK
5501
5502 auto use = act_bomb_type->get_use( "explosion" );
5503 if( use == nullptr ) {
5504 // Invalid active bomb item usage, Toggle this special off so we stop processing
5505 add_msg( m_debug, "Invalid active bomb explosion use in kamikaze special for %s.",
5506 z->name() );
5507 z->disable_special( "KAMIKAZE" );
5508 return true;
5509 }
5510 const explosion_iuse *exp_actor = dynamic_cast<const explosion_iuse *>( use->get_actor_ptr() );
5511 if( exp_actor == nullptr ) {
5512 // Invalid active bomb item, Toggle this special off so we stop processing
5513 add_msg( m_debug, "Invalid active bomb type in kamikaze special for %s.", z->name() );
5514 z->disable_special( "KAMIKAZE" );
5515 return true;
5516 }
5517
5518 // Get our blast radius
5519 int radius = -1;
5520 if( exp_actor->fields_radius > radius ) {
5521 radius = exp_actor->fields_radius;
5522 }
5523 if( exp_actor->emp_blast_radius > radius ) {
5524 radius = exp_actor->emp_blast_radius;
5525 }
5526 // Extra check here to avoid sqrt if not needed
5527 if( exp_actor->explosion ) {
5528 int tmp = static_cast<int>( exp_actor->explosion.safe_range() / 2 );
5529 if( tmp > radius ) {
5530 radius = tmp;
5531 }
5532 }
5533 // Flashbangs have a max range of 8
5534 if( exp_actor->do_flashbang && radius < 8 ) {
5535 radius = 8;
5536 }
5537 if( radius <= -1 ) {
5538 // Not a valid explosion size, toggle this special off to stop processing
5539 z->disable_special( "KAMIKAZE" );
5540 return true;
5541 }
5542
5543 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
5544 if( target == nullptr ) {
5545 return false;
5546 }
5547 // Range is (radius + distance they expect to gain on you during the countdown)
5548 // We double target speed because if the player is walking and then start to run their effective speed doubles
5549 // .65 factor was determined experimentally to be about the factor required for players to be able to *just barely*
5550 // outrun the explosion if they drop everything and run.
5551 float factor = static_cast<float>( z->get_speed() ) / static_cast<float>( target->get_speed() * 2 );
5552 int range = std::max( 1, static_cast<int>( .65 * ( radius + 1 + factor * charges ) ) );
5553
5554 // Check if we are in range to begin the countdown
5555 if( !within_target_range( z, target, range ) ) {
5556 return false;
5557 }
5558
5559 // HACK: HORRIBLE HACK ALERT! Currently uses the amount of ammo as a pseudo-timer.
5560 // Once we have proper monster inventory item processing replace the following
5561 // line with the code below.
5562 z->add_effect( effect_countdown, 1_turns * charges + 1_turns );
5563 /* Replacement code here for once we have working monster inventories
5564
5565 item i_explodes(act_bomb_type->id, 0);
5566 i_explodes.charges = charges;
5567 z->add_item(i_explodes);
5568 z->disable_special("KAMIKAZE");
5569 */
5570 // END HORRIBLE HACK
5571
5572 if( g->u.sees( z->pos() ) ) {
5573 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The %s lights up menacingly." ), z->name() );
5574 }
5575
5576 return true;
5577}

◆ multi_robot()

bool mattack::multi_robot ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 3911 of file monattack.cpp.

3912{
3913 int mode = 0;
3914 int boo_hoo = 0;
3915 Creature *target;
3916 if( z->friendly == 0 ) {
3917 target = z->attack_target();
3918 if( target == nullptr ) {
3919 return false;
3920 }
3921 } else {
3922 target = z->auto_find_hostile_target( 48, boo_hoo );
3923 if( target == nullptr ) {
3924 if( boo_hoo > 0 && g->u.sees( *z ) ) { // because that stupid oaf was in the way!
3925 add_msg( m_warning, vgettext( "Pointed in your direction, the %s emits an IFF warning beep.",
3926 "Pointed in your direction, the %s emits %d annoyed sounding beeps.",
3927 boo_hoo ),
3928 z->name(), boo_hoo );
3929 }
3930 return false;
3931 }
3932 }
3933
3934 int cap = target->power_rating();
3935 monster *mon = dynamic_cast< monster * >( target );
3936 // Their attitude to us and not ours to them, so that bobcats won't get gunned down
3937 // Only monster-types for now - assuming humans are smart enough not to make it obvious
3938 // Unless damaged - then everything is hostile
3939 if( z->get_hp() <= z->get_hp_max() ||
3940 ( mon != nullptr && mon->attitude_to( *z ) == Creature::Attitude::A_HOSTILE ) ) {
3941 cap += 2;
3942 }
3943
3944 int dist = rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() );
3945 if( dist <= 15 ) {
3946 mode = 1;
3947 } else if( dist <= 30 ) {
3948 mode = 2;
3949 } else if( ( target == &g->u && g->u.in_vehicle ) ||
3950 z->friendly != 0 ||
3951 cap > 4 ) {
3952 // Primary only kicks in if you're in a vehicle or are big enough to be mistaken for one.
3953 // Or if you've hacked it so the turret's on your side. ;-)
3954 if( dist < 50 ) {
3955 // Enforced max-range of 50.
3956 mode = 5;
3957 cap = 5;
3958 }
3959 }
3960
3961 // No attacks were valid!
3962 if( mode == 0 ) {
3963 return false;
3964 }
3965
3966 if( mode > cap ) {
3967 mode = cap;
3968 }
3969 switch( mode ) {
3970 case 1:
3971 if( dist <= 15 ) {
3972 rifle( z, target );
3973 }
3974 break;
3975 case 2:
3976 if( dist <= 30 ) {
3977 frag( z, target );
3978 }
3979 break;
3980 default:
3981 // Weak stuff, shouldn't bother with
3982 return false;
3983 }
3984
3985 return true;
3986}

2939 if( found_target ) {
2940
2941 // First we offer the check up then we wait to the player to come close
2942 if( !z->has_effect( effect_countdown ) ) {
2943 sounds::sound( z->pos(), 8, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
2944 string_format(
2945 _( "a soft robotic voice say, \"Come here and stand still for a few minutes, I'll give you a check-up.\"" ) ) );
2946 z->add_effect( effect_countdown, 30_minutes );
2947 } else if( rl_dist( target->pos(), z->pos() ) > 1 ) {
2948 // Giving them some encouragement
2949 sounds::sound( z->pos(), 8, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
2950 string_format(
2951 _( "a soft robotic voice say, \"Come on. I don't bite, I promise it won't hurt one bit.\"" ) ) );
2952 } else {
2953 sounds::sound( z->pos(), 8, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
2954 string_format(
2955 _( "a soft robotic voice say, \"Here we go. Just hold still.\"" ) ) );
2956 if( target == &g->u ) {
2957 add_msg( m_good, _( "You get a medical check-up." ) );
2958 }
2959 target->add_effect( effect_got_checked, 10_turns );
2960 z->remove_effect( effect_countdown );
2961 }
2962 return true;
2963 }
2964 return false;
2965}

◆ pull_metal_weapon()

bool mattack::pull_metal_weapon ( monster *  z)
Strength increases resistance to pull_metal_weapon special attack Melee increases resistance to pull_metal_weapon special attack

Definition at line 787 of file monattack.cpp.

788{
789 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
790 // Constants and Configuration
791
792 // max distance that "pull_metal_weapon" can be applied to the target.
793 constexpr auto max_distance = 12;
794
795 // attack movement costs
796 constexpr int att_cost_pull = 150;
797
798 // minimum str to resist "pull_metal_weapon"
799 constexpr int min_str = 4;
800
801 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
802 if( target == nullptr ) {
803 return false;
804 }
805
806 // Can't see/reach target, no attack
807 if( !z->sees( *target ) || !g->m.clear_path( z->pos(), target->pos(),
808 max_distance, 1, 100 ) ) {
809 return false;
810 }
811 player *foe = dynamic_cast< player * >( target );
812 if( foe != nullptr ) {
813 // Wielded steel or iron items except for built-in things like bionic claws or monomolecular blade
814 if( !foe->weapon.has_flag( "NO_UNWIELD" ) &&
815 ( foe->weapon.made_of( material_id( "iron" ) ) ||
816 foe->weapon.made_of( material_id( "hardsteel" ) ) ||
817 foe->weapon.made_of( material_id( "steel" ) ) ||
818 foe->weapon.made_of( material_id( "budget_steel" ) ) ) ) {
819 int wp_skill = foe->get_skill_level( skill_melee );
820 // It takes a while
821 z->moves -= att_cost_pull;
822 int success = 100;
823 ///\EFFECT_STR increases resistance to pull_metal_weapon special attack
824 if( foe->str_cur > min_str ) {
825 ///\EFFECT_MELEE increases resistance to pull_metal_weapon special attack
826 success = std::max( 100 - ( 6 * ( foe->str_cur - 6 ) ) - ( 6 * wp_skill ), 0 );
827 }
828 auto m_type = foe == &g->u ? m_bad : m_neutral;
829 if( rng( 1, 100 ) <= success ) {
830 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_type, _( "%s is pulled away from your hands!" ),
831 _( "%s is pulled away from <npcname>'s hands!" ), foe->weapon.tname() );
832 z->add_item( foe->remove_weapon() );
833 if( foe->has_activity( ACT_RELOAD ) ) {
834 foe->cancel_activity();
835 }
836 } else {
837 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_type,
838 _( "The %s unsuccessfully attempts to pull your weapon away." ),
839 _( "The %s unsuccessfully attempts to pull <npcname>'s weapon away." ), z->name() );
840 }
841 }
842 }
843
844 return true;
845}

◆ ranged_pull()

bool mattack::ranged_pull ( monster *  z)

2593{
2594 Creature *target = z->attack_target();

2596 rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() ) <= 1 || !z->sees( *target ) ||

2598 return false;
2599 }
2600
2601 map &here = get_map();
2602
2603 player *foe = dynamic_cast< player * >( target );
2604 std::vector<tripoint> line = here.find_clear_path( z->pos(), target->pos() );
2605 bool seen = g->u.sees( *z );
2606 tripoint prev_point = z->pos();
2607 for( auto &i : line ) {
2608 // Player can't be pulled though bars, furniture, cars or creatures
2609 // TODO: Add bashing? Currently a window is enough to prevent grabbing
2610 if( ( !g->is_empty( i ) && i != z->pos() && i != target->pos() ) ||
2611 here.obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( prev_point, i ) ) {
2612 return false;
2613 }
2614 prev_point = i;
2615 }
2616
2617 z->moves -= 150;
2618
2619 const bool uncanny = target->uncanny_dodge();
2620 if( uncanny || dodge_check( z, target ) ) {
2621 z->moves -= 200;
2622 auto msg_type = foe == &g->u ? m_warning : m_info;
2623 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( msg_type, _( "The %s's arms fly out at you, but you dodge!" ),
2624 _( "The %s's arms fly out at <npcname>, but they dodge!" ),
2625 z->name() );
2626
2627 if( !uncanny ) {
2628 target->on_dodge( z, z->type->melee_skill * 2 );
2629 }
2630
2631 return true;
2632 }
2633
2634 // Limit the range in case some weird math thing would cause the target to fly past us
2635 int range = std::min( ( z->type->melee_sides * z->type->melee_dice ) / 10,
2636 rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() ) + 1 );
2637 tripoint pt = target->pos();
2638 while( range > 0 ) {
2639 // Recalculate the ray each step
2640 // We can't depend on either the target position being constant (obviously),
2641 // but neither on z pos staying constant, because we may want to shift the map mid-pull
2642 const units::angle dir = coord_to_angle( target->pos(), z->pos() );
2643 tileray tdir( dir );
2644 tdir.advance();
2645 pt.x = target->posx() + tdir.dx();
2646 pt.y = target->posy() + tdir.dy();
2647 if( !g->is_empty( pt ) ) { //Cancel the grab if the space is occupied by something
2648 break;
2649 }
2650
2651 if( foe != nullptr ) {
2652 if( foe->in_vehicle ) {
2653 here.unboard_vehicle( foe->pos() );
2654 }
2655
2656 if( target->is_player() && ( pt.x < HALF_MAPSIZE_X || pt.y < HALF_MAPSIZE_Y ||
2657 pt.x >= HALF_MAPSIZE_X + SEEX || pt.y >= HALF_MAPSIZE_Y + SEEY ) ) {
2658 g->update_map( pt.x, pt.y );
2659 }
2660 }
2661
2662 target->setpos( pt );
2663 range--;
2664 if( target->is_player() && seen ) {
2665 g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
2666 inp_mngr.pump_events();
2667 ui_manager::redraw_invalidated();
2668 refresh_display();
2669 }
2670 }
2671 // The monster might drag a target that's not on it's z level
2672 // So if they leave them on open air, make them fall
2673 here.creature_on_trap( *target );
2674 if( seen ) {
2675 if( z->type->bodytype == "human" || z->type->bodytype == "angel" ) {
2676 add_msg( _( "The %1$s's arms fly out and pull and grab %2$s!" ), z->name(),
2677 target->disp_name() );
2678 } else {
2679 add_msg( _( "The %1$s reaches out and pulls %2$s!" ), z->name(),
2680 target->disp_name() );
2681 }
2682 }
2683
2684 const int prev_effect = target->get_effect_int( effect_grabbed );
2685 //Duration needs to be at least 2, or grab will immediately be removed
2686 target->add_effect( effect_grabbed, 2_turns, bp_torso, prev_effect + 4 );
2687 z->add_effect( effect_grabbing, 2_turns );
2688 return true;
2689}

◆ resurrect()

bool mattack::resurrect ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 968 of file monattack.cpp.

969{
970 // Chance to recover some of our missing speed (yes this will regain
971 // loses from being revived ourselves as well).
972 // Multiplying by (current base speed / max speed) means that the
973 // rate of speed regaining is unaffected by what our current speed is, i.e.
974 // we will regain the same amount per minute at speed 50 as speed 200.
975 if( one_in( static_cast<int>( 15 * static_cast<double>( z->get_speed_base() ) / static_cast<double>
976 ( z->type->speed ) ) ) ) {
977 // Restore 10% of our current speed, capping at our type maximum
978 z->set_speed_base( std::min( z->type->speed,
979 static_cast<int>( z->get_speed_base() + .1 * z->type->speed ) ) );
980 }
981
982 int raising_level = 0;
983 if( z->has_effect( effect_raising ) ) {
984 raising_level = z->get_effect_int( effect_raising ) * 40;
985 }
986
987 bool sees_necromancer = g->u.sees( *z );
988 std::vector<std::pair<tripoint, item *>> corpses;
989 // Find all corpses that we can see within 10 tiles.
990 int range = 10;
991 bool found_eligible_corpse = false;
992 int lowest_raise_score = INT_MAX;
993 for( const tripoint &p : g->m.points_in_radius( z->pos(), range ) ) {
994 if( !g->is_empty( p ) || g->m.get_field_intensity( p, fd_fire ) > 1 ||
995 !g->m.sees( z->pos(), p, -1 ) ) {
996 continue;
997 }
998
999 for( auto &i : g->m.i_at( p ) ) {
1000 const mtype *mt = i.get_mtype();
1001 if( !( i.is_corpse() && i.can_revive() && i.active && mt->has_flag( MF_REVIVES ) &&
1002 mt->in_species( ZOMBIE ) && !mt->has_flag( MF_NO_NECRO ) ) ) {
1003 continue;
1004 }
1005
1006 found_eligible_corpse = true;
1007 if( raising_level == 0 ) {
1008 // Since we have a target, start charging to raise it.
1009 if( sees_necromancer ) {
1010 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s throws its arms wide." ), z->name() );
1011 }
1012 while( z->moves >= 0 ) {
1013 z->add_effect( effect_raising, 1_minutes );
1014 z->moves -= 100;
1015 }
1016 return false;
1017 }
1018 int raise_score = ( i.damage_level( 4 ) + 1 ) * mt->hp + i.burnt;
1019 lowest_raise_score = std::min( lowest_raise_score, raise_score );
1020 if( raise_score <= raising_level ) {
1021 corpses.push_back( std::make_pair( p, &i ) );
1022 }
1023 }
1024 }
1025
1026 if( corpses.empty() ) { // No nearby corpses
1027 if( found_eligible_corpse ) {
1028 // There was a corpse, but we haven't charged enough.
1029 if( sees_necromancer && x_in_y( 1, std::sqrt( lowest_raise_score / 30.0 ) ) ) {
1030 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s gesticulates wildly." ), z->name() );
1031 }
1032 while( z->moves >= 0 ) {
1033 z->add_effect( effect_raising, 1_minutes );
1034 z->moves -= 100;
1035 return false;
1036 }
1037 } else if( raising_level != 0 ) {
1038 z->remove_effect( effect_raising );
1039 }
1040 // Check to see if there are any nearby living zombies to see if we should get angry
1041 const bool allies = g->get_creature_if( [&]( const Creature & critter ) {
1042 const monster *const zed = dynamic_cast<const monster *>( &critter );
1043 return zed && zed != z && zed->type->has_flag( MF_REVIVES ) && zed->type->in_species( ZOMBIE ) &&
1044 z->attitude_to( *zed ) == Creature::Attitude::A_FRIENDLY &&
1045 within_target_range( z, zed, 10 );
1046 } );
1047 if( !allies ) {
1048 // Nobody around who we could revive, get angry
1049 z->anger = 100;
1050 } else {
1051 // Someone is around who might die and we could revive,
1052 // calm down.
1053 z->anger = 5;
1054 }
1055 return false;
1056 } else {
1057 // We're reviving someone/could revive someone, calm down.
1058 z->anger = 5;
1059 }
1060
1061 if( z->get_speed_base() <= z->type->speed / 2 ) {
1062 // We can only resurrect so many times in a time period
1063 // and we're currently out
1064 return false;
1065 }
1066
1067 std::pair<tripoint, item *> raised = random_entry( corpses );
1068 // To appease static analysis
1069 assert( raised.second );
1070 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-core.CallAndMessage)
1071 float corpse_damage = raised.second->damage_level( 4 );
1072 // Did we successfully raise something?
1073 if( g->revive_corpse( raised.first, *raised.second ) ) {
1074 g->m.i_rem( raised.first, raised.second );
1075 if( sees_necromancer ) {
1076 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s gestures at a nearby corpse." ), z->name() );
1077 }
1078 z->remove_effect( effect_raising );
1079 // Takes one turn
1080 z->moves -= z->type->speed;
1081 // Penalize speed by between 10% and 50% based on how damaged the corpse is.
1082 float speed_penalty = 0.1 + ( corpse_damage * 0.1 );
1083 z->set_speed_base( z->get_speed_base() - speed_penalty * z->type->speed );
1084 monster *const zed = g->critter_at<monster>( raised.first );
1085 if( !zed ) {
1086 debugmsg( "Misplaced or failed to revive a zombie corpse" );
1087 return true;
1088 }
1089
1090 zed->make_ally( *z );
1091 if( g->u.sees( *zed ) ) {
1092 add_msg( m_warning, _( "A nearby %s rises from the dead!" ), zed->name() );
1093 } else if( sees_necromancer ) {
1094 // We saw the necromancer but not the revival
1095 add_msg( m_info, _( "But nothing seems to happen." ) );
1096 }
1097 }
1098
1099 return true;
1100}

bool mattack::riotbot ( monster *  z)

4819
4820 if( is_uncanny || is_dex ) {

4824 }

4832 foe->moves -= 300;
4833 add_msg( _( "The robot puts handcuffs on you." ) );

4848 return true;

4852

4855 ///\EFFECT_INT >10 allows and increases chance of successful feign death against riot bot
4856 if( !one_in( foe->int_cur - 10 ) ) {

4876 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( z->pos(), 2 ) ) {
4877 if( here.passable( dest ) &&
4878 here.clear_path( z->pos(), dest, 3, 1, 100 ) ) {
4879 here.add_field( dest, fd_tear_gas, rng( 1, 3 ) );
4880 }
4881 }
4882
4883 return true;
4884 }
4885
4886 return true;
4887 }
4888
4889 if( calendar::once_every( 5_turns ) ) {
4890 sounds::sound( z->pos(), 25, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
4891 _( "Empty your hands and hold your position, citizen!" ), false, "speech", z->type->id.str() );
4892 }
4893
4894 if( dist > 5 && dist < 18 && one_in( 10 ) ) {
4895
4896 z->moves -= 50;
4897
4898 // Precautionary shot
4899 int delta = dist / 4 + 1;
4900 // Precision shot
4901 if( z->get_hp() < z->get_hp_max() ) {
4902 delta = 1;
4903 }
4904
4905 tripoint dest( target->posx() + rng( 0, delta ) - rng( 0, delta ),
4906 target->posy() + rng( 0, delta ) - rng( 0, delta ),
4907 target->posz() );
4908
4909 //~ Sound of a riotbot using its blinding flash
4910 sounds::sound( z->pos(), 3, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "fzzzzzt" ), false, "misc", "flash" );
4911
4912 std::vector<tripoint> traj = line_to( z->pos(), dest, 0, 0 );
4913 tripoint prev_point = z->pos();
4914 for( auto &elem : traj ) {
4915 if( !here.is_transparent( elem ) || here.obscured_by_vehicle_rotation( prev_point, elem ) ) {
4916 break;
4917 }
4918 here.add_field( elem, fd_dazzling, 1 );
4919 prev_point = elem;
4920 }
4921 return true;
4922
4923 }
4924
4925 return true;
4926}

◆ science()

bool mattack::science ( monster *  z)
Dodge increases chance to avoid science effect

Definition at line 1216 of file monattack.cpp.

1217{
1218 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1219 // Constants and Configuration
1220
1221 // attack types
1222 enum : int {
1223 att_shock,
1224 att_radiation,
1225 att_manhack,
1226 att_acid_pool,
1227 att_flavor,
1228 att_enum_size
1229 };
1230
1231 // max distance that "science" can be applied to the target.
1232 constexpr auto max_distance = 5;
1233
1234 // attack movement costs
1235 constexpr int att_cost_shock = 0;
1236 constexpr int att_cost_rad = 400;
1237 constexpr int att_cost_manhack = 200;
1238 constexpr int att_cost_acid = 100;
1239 constexpr int att_cost_flavor = 80;
1240
1241 // radiation attack behavior
1242 // how hard it is to dodge
1243 constexpr int att_rad_dodge_diff = 16;
1244 // (1/x) inverse chance to cause mutation.
1245 constexpr int att_rad_mutate_chance = 6;
1246 // min radiation
1247 constexpr int att_rad_dose_min = 20;
1248 // max radiation
1249 constexpr int att_rad_dose_max = 50;
1250
1251 // acid attack behavior
1252 constexpr int att_acid_intensity = 3;
1253
1254 if( !z->can_act() ) {
1255 return false;
1256 }
1257
1258 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1259 // Look for a valid target...
1260 Creature *const target = z->attack_target();
1261 if( !target ) {
1262 return false;
1263 }
1264
1265 // too far
1266 const int dist = rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() );
1267 if( dist > max_distance ) {
1268 return false;
1269 }
1270
1271 // can't attack what you can't see
1272 if( !z->sees( *target ) ) {
1273 return false;
1274 }
1275
1276 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1277 // okay, we have a valid target; populate valid attack options...
1278 std::array<int, att_enum_size> valid_attacks;
1279 size_t valid_attack_count = 0;
1280
1281 // can only shock if adjacent
1282 if( dist == 1 ) {
1283 valid_attacks[valid_attack_count++] = att_shock;
1284 }
1285
1286 // TODO: mutate() doesn't like non-players right now
1287 // It will mutate NPCs, but it will say it mutated the player
1288 player *const foe = dynamic_cast<player *>( target );
1289 if( ( foe == &g->u ) && dist <= 2 ) {
1290 valid_attacks[valid_attack_count++] = att_radiation;
1291 }
1292
1293 // need an open space for these attacks
1294 const auto empty_neighbors = find_empty_neighbors( *z );
1295 const size_t empty_neighbor_count = empty_neighbors.second;
1296
1297 if( empty_neighbor_count ) {
1298 if( z->ammo[itype_bot_manhack] > 0 ) {
1299 valid_attacks[valid_attack_count++] = att_manhack;
1300 }
1301 valid_attacks[valid_attack_count++] = att_acid_pool;
1302 }
1303
1304 // flavor is always okay
1305 valid_attacks[valid_attack_count++] = att_flavor;
1306
1307 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1308 // choose and do a valid attack
1309 const int attack_index = get_random_index( valid_attack_count );
1310 switch( valid_attacks[attack_index] ) {
1311 default:
1312 debugmsg( "Bad attack enum value %d", valid_attacks[attack_index] );
1313 break;
1314 case att_shock :
1315 z->moves -= att_cost_shock;
1316
1317 // Just reuse the taze - it's a bit different (shocks torso vs all),
1318 // but let's go for consistency here
1319 taze( z, target );
1320 break;
1321 case att_radiation : {
1322 z->moves -= att_cost_rad;
1323
1324 // if the player can see it
1325 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
1326 // TODO: mutate() doesn't like non-players right now
1327 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The %1$s fires a shimmering beam towards %2$s!" ),
1328 z->name(), target->disp_name() );
1329 }
1330
1331 // (1) Give the target a chance at an uncanny_dodge.
1332 // (2) If that fails, always fail to dodge 1 in dodge_skill times.
1333 // (3) If okay, dodge if dodge_skill > att_rad_dodge_diff.
1334 // (4) Otherwise, fail 1 in (att_rad_dodge_diff - dodge_skill) times.
1335 if( foe->uncanny_dodge() ) {
1336 break;
1337 }
1338
1339 const int dodge_skill = foe->get_dodge();
1340 const bool critial_fail = one_in( dodge_skill );
1341 const bool is_trivial = dodge_skill > att_rad_dodge_diff;
1342
1343 ///\EFFECT_DODGE increases chance to avoid science effect
1344 if( !critial_fail && ( is_trivial || dodge_skill > rng( 0, att_rad_dodge_diff ) ) ) {
1345 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You dodge the beam!" ),
1346 _( "<npcname> dodges the beam!" ) );
1347 } else {
1348 bool rad_proof = !foe->irradiate( rng( att_rad_dose_min, att_rad_dose_max ) );
1349 if( rad_proof ) {
1350 target->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your armor protects you from the radiation!" ) );
1351 } else if( one_in( att_rad_mutate_chance ) ) {
1352 foe->mutate();
1353 } else {
1354 target->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You get pins and needles all over." ) );
1355 }
1356 }
1357 }
1358 break;
1359 case att_manhack : {
1360 z->moves -= att_cost_manhack;
1361 z->ammo[itype_bot_manhack]--;
1362
1363 // if the player can see it
1364 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
1365 add_msg( m_warning, _( "A manhack flies out of one of the holes on the %s!" ),
1366 z->name() );
1367 }
1368
1369 const tripoint where = empty_neighbors.first[get_random_index( empty_neighbor_count )];
1370 if( monster *const manhack = g->place_critter_at( mon_manhack, where ) ) {
1371 manhack->make_ally( *z );
1372 }
1373 }
1374 break;
1375 case att_acid_pool :
1376 z->moves -= att_cost_acid;
1377
1378 // if the player can see it
1379 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
1380 add_msg( m_warning,
1381 _( "The %s shudders, and some sort of caustic fluid leaks from a its damaged shell!" ),
1382 z->name() );
1383 }
1384
1385 // fill empty tiles with acid
1386 for( size_t i = 0; i < empty_neighbor_count; ++i ) {
1387 const tripoint &p = empty_neighbors.first[i];
1388 g->m.add_field( p, fd_acid, att_acid_intensity );
1389 }
1390
1391 break;
1392 case att_flavor : {
1393 // flavor messages
1394 static const std::array<std::string, 4> m_flavor = {{
1395 translate_marker( "The %s shudders, letting out an eery metallic whining noise!" ),
1396 translate_marker( "The %s scratches its long legs along the floor, shooting sparks." ),
1397 translate_marker( "The %s bleeps inquiringly and focuses a red camera-eye on you." ),
1398 translate_marker( "The %s's combat arms crackle with electricity." ),
1399 //special case; leave the electricity last
1400 }
1401 };
1402
1403 const size_t i = get_random_index( m_flavor );
1404
1405 // the special case; see above
1406 if( i == m_flavor.size() - 1 ) {
1407 z->moves -= att_cost_flavor;
1408 }
1409
1410 // if the player can see it, else forget about it
1411 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
1412 add_msg( m_warning, _( m_flavor[i] ), z->name() );
1413 }
1414 }
1415 break;
1416 }
1417
1418 return true;
1419}

3615 y--;
3616 break;

3627 x--;
3628 }

◆ shockstorm()

bool mattack::shockstorm ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 733 of file monattack.cpp.

734{
735 if( !z->can_act() ) {
736 return false;
737 }
738
739 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
740 if( target == nullptr ) {
741 return false;
742 }
743
744 bool seen = g->u.sees( *z );
745 // Can't see/reach target, no attack
746 if( !z->sees( *target ) ||
747 !g->m.clear_path( z->pos(), target->pos(), 12, 1, 100 ) ) {
748 return false;
749 }
750
751 // It takes a while
752 z->moves -= 50;
753
754 if( seen ) {
755 auto msg_type = target == &g->u ? m_bad : m_neutral;
756 add_msg( msg_type, _( "A bolt of electricity arcs towards %s!" ), target->disp_name() );
757 }
758 if( !g->u.is_deaf() ) {
759 sfx::play_variant_sound( "fire_gun", "bio_lightning", sfx::get_heard_volume( z->pos() ) );
760 }
761 tripoint tarp( target->posx() + rng( -1, 1 ) + rng( -1, 1 ),
762 target->posy() + rng( -1, 1 ) + rng( -1, 1 ),
763 target->posz() );
764 std::vector<tripoint> bolt = line_to( z->pos(), tarp, 0, 0 );
765 // Fill the LOS with electricity
766 for( auto &i : bolt ) {
767 if( !one_in( 4 ) ) {
768 g->m.add_field( i, fd_electricity, rng( 1, 3 ) );
769 }
770 }
771 // 5x5 cloud of electricity at the square hit
772 for( const auto &dest : g->m.points_in_radius( tarp, 2 ) ) {
773 if( !one_in( 4 ) ) {
774 g->m.add_field( dest, fd_electricity, rng( 1, 3 ) );
775 }
776 }
777
778 return true;
779}

◆ shriek_stun()

bool mattack::shriek_stun ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 488 of file monattack.cpp.

489{
490 if( !z->can_act() || !z->has_effect( effect_shrieking ) ) {
491 return false;
492 }
493
494 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
495 if( target == nullptr ) {
496 return false;
497 }
498
499 int dist = rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() );
500 // Currently the cone is 2D, so don't use it for 3D attacks
501 if( dist > 7 ||
502 z->posz() != target->posz() ||
503 !z->sees( *target ) ) {
504 return false;
505 }
506
507 units::angle target_angle = coord_to_angle( z->pos(), target->pos() );
508 units::angle cone_angle = 20_degrees;
509 map &here = get_map();
510 for( const tripoint &cone : here.points_in_radius( z->pos(), 4 ) ) {
511 units::angle tile_angle = coord_to_angle( z->pos(), cone );
512 units::angle diff = units::fabs( target_angle - tile_angle );
513 // Skip the target, because it's outside cone or it's the source
514 if( diff + cone_angle > 360_degrees || diff > cone_angle || cone == z->pos() ) {
515 continue;
516 }
517 // Affect the target
518 // Small bash to every square, silent to not flood message box
519 here.bash( cone, 4, true );
520
521 // If a monster is there, chance for stun
522 Creature *target = g->critter_at( cone );
523 if( target == nullptr ) {
524 continue;
525 }
526 if( one_in( dist / 2 ) && !( target->is_immune_effect( effect_deaf ) ) ) {
527 target->add_effect( effect_dazed, rng( 1_minutes, 2_minutes ), num_bp, rng( 1,
528 ( 15 - dist ) / 3 ) );
529 }
530
531 }
532
533 return true;
534}

4621 return false;

4626 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
4627 case 1:
4628 //~ Your slimes try to cheer you up!
4629 //~ Lowercase is intended: they're small voices.
4630 add_msg( m_good, _( "\"hey, it's gonna be all right!\"" ) );

4632 break;
4633 case 2:
4634 //~ Your slimes try to cheer you up!
4635 //~ Lowercase is intended: they're small voices.
4636 add_msg( m_good, _( "\"we'll get through this!\"" ) );
4637 g->u.add_morale( MORALE_SUPPORT, 10, 50 );
4638 break;

4640 //~ Your slimes try to cheer you up!
4641 //~ Lowercase is intended: they're small voices.

4643 g->u.add_morale( MORALE_SUPPORT, 10, 50 );
4644 break;

4649 //~ Lowercase is intended: they're small voices.
4650 add_msg( _( "\"let me help!\"" ) );
4651 // Yes, your slimespring(s) handle/don't all Bad Damage at the same time.
4652 if( g->u.has_effect( effect_bite ) ) {
4653 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4654 g->u.remove_effect( effect_bite );
4655 add_msg( m_good, _( "The slime cleans you out!" ) );
4656 } else {
4657 add_msg( _( "The slime flows over you, but your gouges still ache." ) );
4658 }
4659 }

4661 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
4662 g->u.remove_effect( effect_bleed );
4663 add_msg( m_good, _( "The slime seals up your leaks!" ) );
4664 } else {
4665 add_msg( _( "The slime flows over you, but your fluids are still leaking." ) );
4666 }
4667 }
4668 }
4669 }
4670
4671 return true;
4672}

◆ stretch_attack()

bool mattack::stretch_attack ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 5738 of file monattack.cpp.

5739{
5740 if( !z->can_act() ) {
5741 return false;
5742 }
5743
5744 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
5745 if( target == nullptr ) {
5746 return false;
5747 }
5748
5749 int distance = rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() );
5750 if( distance < 2 || distance > 3 || !z->sees( *target ) ) {
5751 return false;
5752 }
5753
5754 int dam = rng( 5, 10 );
5755 z->moves -= 100;
5756 tripoint prev_point = z->pos();
5757 bool bounce = false;
5758 for( auto &pnt : g->m.find_clear_path( z->pos(), target->pos() ) ) {
5759 if( g->m.obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( prev_point, pnt ) ) {
5760 bounce = true;
5761 //50% chance of bouncing off each intervening tile
5762 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
5763 pnt.x = prev_point.x;
5764 } else {
5765 pnt.y = prev_point.y;
5766 }
5767 }
5768 if( bounce || g->m.impassable( pnt ) ) {
5769 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "The %1$s thrusts its arm at you, but bounces off the %2$s." ),
5770 _( "The %1$s thrusts its arm at <npcname>, but bounces off the %2$s." ),
5771 z->name(), g->m.obstacle_name( pnt ) );
5772 return true;
5773 }
5774
5775 prev_point = pnt;
5776
5777 }

5781 _( "The %s thrusts its arm at you, stretching to reach you from afar." ),
5782 _( "The %s thrusts its arm at <npcname>." ),
5783 z->name() );

5786 _( "<npcname> evades the stretched arm!" ) );
5787 target->on_dodge( z, z->type->melee_skill * 2 );
5788 //takes some time to retract the arm
5789 z->moves -= 150;
5790 return true;
5791 }
5792

5794 dam = target->deal_damage( z, hit, damage_instance( DT_STAB, dam ) ).total_damage();
5795
5796 if( dam > 0 ) {
5797 auto msg_type = target == &g->u ? m_bad : m_info;
5798 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( msg_type,
5799 //~ 1$s is monster name, 2$s bodypart in accusative
5800 _( "The %1$s's arm pierces your %2$s!" ),
5801 //~ 1$s is monster name, 2$s bodypart in accusative
5802 _( "The %1$s arm pierces <npcname>'s %2$s!" ),
5803 z->name(),
5804 body_part_name_accusative( hit->token ) );
5805
5806 target->check_dead_state();
5807 } else {
5808 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "The %1$s arm hits your %2$s, but glances off your armor!" ),
5809 _( "The %1$s hits <npcname>'s %2$s, but glances off armor!" ),
5810 z->name(),
5811 body_part_name_accusative( hit->token ) );

5815

4119 return false;

4123 // can be used at close range too!
4124 Creature *target = z->attack_target();
4125 if( target == nullptr || rl_dist( z->pos(), target->pos() ) > 3 || !z->sees( *target ) ) {
4126 return false;
4127 }
4128
4129 z->moves -= 150;
4130
4131 tripoint prev_point = z->pos();

4133 for( auto &pnt : g->m.find_clear_path( z->pos(), target->pos() ) ) {
4134
4135 if( get_map().obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( prev_point, pnt ) ) {
4136 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
4137 pnt.x = prev_point.x;
4138 } else {
4139 pnt.y = prev_point.y;
4140 }
4141 obstructed = true;
4142 }
4143

4147 _( "The %1$s stretches its head at <npcname>, but bounces off the %2$s" ),
4148 z->name(), g->m.obstacle_name( pnt ) );
4149 return true;
4150 }
4151 prev_point = pnt;
4152 }
4153 bool uncanny = target->uncanny_dodge();
4154 // Can we dodge the attack? Uses player dodge function % chance (melee.cpp)
4155 if( uncanny || dodge_check( z, target ) ) {
4156 z->moves -= 150;
4157 z->add_effect( effect_stunned, 3_turns );
4158 auto msg_type = target == &g->u ? m_warning : m_info;
4159 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( msg_type,
4160 _( "The %s's head extends to bite you, but you dodge and the head sails past!" ),
4161 _( "The %s's head extends to bite <npcname>, but they dodge and the head sails past!" ),
4162 z->name() );
4163 if( !uncanny ) {
4164 target->on_dodge( z, z->type->melee_skill * 2 );
4165 }
4166 return true;
4167 }
4168
4169 const bodypart_id hit = target->get_random_body_part();
4170 const body_part hit_token = hit->token;
4171 // More damage due to the speed of the moving head
4172 int dam = rng( 5, 15 );
4173 dam = target->deal_damage( z, hit, damage_instance( DT_STAB, dam ) ).total_damage();
4174
4175 if( dam > 0 ) {
4176 auto msg_type = target == &g->u ? m_bad : m_info;
4177 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( msg_type,
4178 //~ 1$s is monster name, 2$s bodypart in accusative
4179 _( "The %1$s's teeth sink into your %2$s!" ),
4180 //~ 1$s is monster name, 2$s bodypart in accusative
4181 _( "The %1$s's teeth sink into <npcname>'s %2$s!" ),
4182 z->name(),
4183 body_part_name_accusative( hit_token ) );
4184
4185 if( one_in( 16 - dam ) ) {
4186 if( target->has_effect( effect_bite, hit_token ) ) {
4187 target->add_effect( effect_bite, 40_minutes, hit_token );
4188 } else if( target->has_effect( effect_infected, hit_token ) ) {
4189 target->add_effect( effect_infected, 25_minutes, hit_token );
4190 } else {
4191 target->add_effect( effect_bite, 1_turns, hit_token );
4192 }
4193 }
4194 } else {
4195 target->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "The %1$s's head hits your %2$s, but glances off your armor!" ),
4196 _( "The %1$s's head hits <npcname>'s %2$s, but glances off armor!" ),
4197 z->name(),
4198 body_part_name_accusative( hit_token ) );
4199 }
4200
4201 target->on_hit( z, hit );
4202
4203 return true;
4204}

◆ tankgun()

void mattack::tankgun ( monster *  z,

4686 return false;
4687 }

4691 ///\EFFECT_DEX increases chance judo-throwing a monster
4692

4720 }
4721 return true;
4722 } else {
4723 return false;

5085 }

5087 }
5088 }
5089 // couldn't teleport without losing sight of target
5090 z->setpos( oldpos );
5091 return true;
5092 }
5093 return true;

1636{

1638 "heartbeat" );
1639 z->moves -= 300;
1640 if( z->friendly != 0 ) {
1641 return true;
1642 // TODO: when friendly: open a way to the stairs, don't spawn monsters
1643 }
1644 if( g->u.posz() != z->posz() ) {
1645 // Maybe remove this and allow spawning monsters above?
1646 return true;
1647 }
1648
1649 static pathfinding_settings root_pathfind( 10, 20, 50, 0, false, false, false, false, false );
1650 if( rl_dist( z->pos(), g->u.pos() ) > 5 &&
1651 !g->m.route( g->u.pos(), z->pos(), root_pathfind ).empty() ) {
1652 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The root walls creak around you." ) );
1653 for( const tripoint &dest : g->m.points_in_radius( z->pos(), 3 ) ) {
1654 if( g->is_empty( dest ) && one_in( 4 ) ) {
1655 g->m.ter_set( dest, t_root_wall );
1656 } else if( g->m.ter( dest ) == t_root_wall && one_in( 10 ) ) {
1657 g->m.ter_set( dest, t_dirt );
1658 }
1659 }
1660 // Open blank tiles as long as there's no possible route
1661 int tries = 0;
1662 while( g->m.route( g->u.pos(), z->pos(), root_pathfind ).empty() &&
1663 tries < 20 ) {
1664 point p( rng( g->u.posx(), z->posx() - 3 ), rng( g->u.posy(), z->posy() - 3 ) );
1665 tripoint dest( p, z->posz() );
1666 tries++;
1667 g->m.ter_set( dest, t_dirt );
1668 if( rl_dist( dest, g->u.pos() ) > 3 && g->num_creatures() < 30 &&
1669 !g->critter_at( dest ) && one_in( 20 ) ) { // Spawn an extra monster
1670 mtype_id montype = mon_triffid;
1671 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
1672 montype = mon_creeper_hub;
1673 } else if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
1674 montype = mon_biollante;
1675 }
1676 if( monster *const plant = g->place_critter_at( montype, dest ) ) {
1677 plant->make_ally( *z );
1678 }
1679 }
1680 }
1681
1682 } else { // The player is close enough for a fight!
1683
1684 // Spawn a monster in (about) every second surrounding tile.
1685 for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i ) {
1686 if( monster *const triffid = g->place_critter_around( mon_triffid, z->pos(), 1 ) ) {
1687 triffid->make_ally( *z );
1688 }
1689 }
1690 }
1691
1692 return true;
1693}

◆ upgrade()

bool mattack::upgrade ( monster *  z)

Definition at line 4033 of file monattack.cpp.

4034{
4035 std::vector<monster *> targets;
4036 for( monster &zed : g->all_monsters() ) {
4037 // Check this first because it is a relatively cheap check
4038 if( zed.can_upgrade() ) {
4039 // Then do the more expensive ones
4040 if( z->attitude_to( zed ) != Creature::Attitude::A_HOSTILE &&
4041 within_target_range( z, &zed, 10 ) ) {
4042 targets.push_back( &zed );
4043 }
4044 }
4045 }
4046 if( targets.empty() ) {
4047 // Nobody to upgrade, get MAD!
4048 z->anger = 100;
4049 return false;
4050 } else {
4051 // We've got zombies to upgrade now, calm down again
4052 z->anger = 5;
4053 }
4054
4055 // Takes one turn
4056 z->moves -= z->type->speed;
4057
4058 monster *target = random_entry( targets );
4059
4060 std::string old_name = target->name();
4061 const auto could_see = g->u.sees( *target );
4062 target->hasten_upgrade();
4063 target->try_upgrade( false );
4064 const auto can_see = g->u.sees( *target );
4065 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
4066 if( could_see ) {
4067 //~ %1$s is the name of the zombie upgrading the other, %2$s is the zombie being upgraded.
4068 add_msg( m_warning, _( "A black mist floats from the %1$s around the %2$s." ),
4069 z->name(), old_name );
4070 } else {
4071 add_msg( m_warning, _( "A black mist floats from the %s." ), z->name() );
4072 }
4073 }
4074 if( target->name() != old_name ) {
4075 if( could_see && can_see ) {
4076 //~ %1$s is the pre-upgrade monster, %2$s is the post-upgrade monster.
4077 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %1$s becomes a %2$s!" ), old_name,
4078 target->name() );
4079 } else if( could_see ) {
4080 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %s vanishes!" ), old_name );
4081 } else if( can_see ) {
4082 add_msg( m_warning, _( "A %s appears!" ), target->name() );
4083 }
4084 }
4085
4086 return true;
4087}

1598 return true;

1602 vine->reset_special( "VINE" );
1603 // Store position of parent hub in vine goal point.
1604 vine->set_goal( z->move_target() );
1605 }

1607 return true;

5822 for( const tripoint &p : g->m.points_in_radius( z->pos(), 1 ) ) {
5823 critter = g->critter_at<monster>( p );
5824 if( critter != nullptr && critter->faction == z->faction
5825 && critter != z && critter->get_size() <= z->get_size() ) {
5826 break;
5827 }
5828 }
5829
5830 if( critter == nullptr || ( z->has_effect( effect_grown_of_fuse ) &&
5831 ( z->get_hp() + critter->get_hp() > z->get_hp_max() + z->get_effect(
5832 effect_grown_of_fuse ).get_max_intensity() ) ) ) {
5833 return false;
5834 }
5835 if( g->u.sees( *z ) ) {
5836 add_msg( _( "The %1$s fuses with the %2$s." ),
5837 critter->name(),
5838 z->name() );
5839 }
5840 z->moves -= 200;
5841 z->add_effect( effect_grown_of_fuse, 10_days, num_bp,
5842 critter->get_hp_max() + z->get_effect( effect_grown_of_fuse ).get_intensity() );
5843 z->heal( critter->get_hp(), true );
5844 critter->death_drops = false;
5845 critter->die( z );
5846 return true;
5847}
